ID: C337554_02
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com>
CC: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-25 14:02
Subject: Fw: HO1 exit gate
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hani,

Hope all is well.

With reference to the Property Insurance policy of Real FZE, please note that there was an incident involving a motor collision that hit the exit gate at Head Office-1 (Plot B34BS22), resulting in damages that now require repair.

A site visit was conducted to assess the damages, and the necessary rectifications include repainting the doors, replacing the Chalhoub logos, and refixing the bottom plate. The police report along with the supplier's quotation is duly enclosed.

Appreciate it you could open a claim file and do advise if any further details are required.

Best Regards,
Hagop

Dear Hagop,

 

All is well and hope you are too. 

 

In such scenarios, we would encourage you to directly approach the at fault motor insurer to avoid bearing the deductible and register claims under your property policy. 

 

However, if you wish to raise the claim under your property policy, kindly confirm back to us and we will take it forward. 

 

Regards,

 

Hani Gebara
Head of General Claims

T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291 M +971 52 839 8676 D +971 4 305 1657
